title: Auth0 Management API Webhooks
name: auth0-webhooks
author: auth0
description: Allows you to define webhooks for Auth0's Management API. It will go through the audit logs and call a webhook for specific events.

BATCH_SIZE.description: The amount of logs to be read on each execution. Maximum is 100.

AUTH0_API_ENDPOINTS.description: Allows you to filter specific API endpoints, comma separated.
AUTH0_API_ENDPOINTS.example: e.g.: users, connections, rules, logs, emails, stats, clients, tenants

SEND_AS_BATCH.description: If enabled, extension will send entire batch in one request. Otherwise, it will send requests one by one.

WEBHOOK_CONCURRENT_CALLS.description: The maximum concurrent calls that will be made to your webhook

START_FROM.description: Checkpoint ID of log to start from.

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack Incoming Webhook URL used to report statistics and possible failures

SLACK_SEND_SUCCESS.description: This setting will enable verbose notifications to Slack which are useful for troubleshooting
